Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:

> I think Robert was talking about adding memory to run the tests, not the
> software.

I caught that. Memory problems in the tests usually mean memory problems 
in the production code.

> One of these tests should probably make sure that said software doesn't eat
> up too much memory :-)

...at the first sign of trouble, yes.
